snippet.title: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adventure (GBC)
snippet.description:
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adventure
Chapter 1: Arrival and To Oasis
"Like the original Dragon Warrior Monsters for the Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure combines themes and characters from Enix' long-running Dragon Warrior series with aspects of gameplay established in the amazingly popular Pokémon handheld games. Players take on the role of Tara as she embarks on a new adventure of monster collecting, training, and combat. A concurrently released companion game, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey, follows the similar adventures of Tara's brother." (Moby Games)
Found this in my collection almost by accident. Looks like a wonderful cross between Dragon Quest and Pokemon.
In this session I get to the island of Greatlog! and am given a magic key from an elemental spirit that reminds me of the spirits in Golden Dawn.
Then I have to travel to other worlds to collect monsters.
